column4: Can someone tell me how to edit my fstab so my NTFS Windows partition shows up as Windows in Computer rather than being in /media/sda1?
What wyndblade said is: gksudo /etc/fstab, change /media/sda1 to /windows, then sudo mkdir /windows, then umount /media/sda1, then mount -a

IE-only apps are likely activeX, which are essentially windows executables. You might have some luck running a few of them under wine, but not many and not well. http://www.tatanka.com.br/ies4linux/page/Main_Page
IE no longer runs under a default wine because of the implementation of the gecko engine right into wine. Check out the ies4linux site I gave you.
